title: Establishes a personal income tax credit for portion of residential real property taxes which exceeds a certain percentage of the household gross income
summary: Establishes a personal income tax credit for a portion of a taxpayer's residential real property taxes which exceeds a certain percentage of the taxpayer's household gross income; provides that the taxpayer shall have resided in such residential real property for not less than 10 years; provides that such credit shall not apply to taxpayers whose household gross income exceeds $250,000 or who have received the school tax relief exemption on such real property.
